page.title: 19Religion in Stoke
page.content: We counted eight churches around our area.Some were large stone buildings. They had graveyards by the side.Other churches were by the houses.One of the churches,Stoke Baptist Church,is beginning to fall down.The church people have bought our old First school and made it in the new Stoke Baptist church. Some children in our school are Muslims and they go to a Mosque.There isn't a Mosque near to where they live so they have to go to Shelton.The Muslims wear brightly coloured clothes especially when they are celebrating festivals.Our school is a C.E. school but we all do R.E. together and have assemblies together.It's fun learning about different religions.
